title: Touring Mexico
brief_description: Mexico is a clash of climates, cultures and geographical extremes, and civilisations that rose and fell centuries before Columbus discovered America. See Mexico City, Mayan and Aztec civilisations at Chichen-Itza and Teotihuacan; Colonial Guadalajara, Merida, Oaxaca, resorts of Puerto Vallarta, Cancun, Cozumel, Acapulco and Baja.
